title: World News, Economics and Analysis Based on Bible Prophecy
cleaned_text:
The government is taking a somewhat standard flu epidemic and manipulating it to expand its power.

Gotten Your Jab Yet? Vaccines have been hailed as the miracle that will help COVID-weary society return to normal. But one ingredient has been missing from the vaccine rollout: honesty.

All Roads Lead to the Vaccine Is it because it is effective? Or is it because of something else?

The economists behind the covid lockdowns are not champions of the poor.

And the propaganda media is censoring you from hearing about it.

While the Bilderberg Group may not be the shadow government of conspiracy theorist lore, it is still one of the most influential groups in the world.

You Are Living in an Experiment Global experimentation in mandates, lockdowns, vaccines and manipulated viruses is part of an even larger exercise in trial and error.

The Coronavirus, Bioweapons and the Pale Horse The coronavirus has advanced science to the point where previously unimaginable weapons can now be made and refined.

You might recognize the mass hypnosis regarding COVID-19. But there are other near-universal beliefs you need to look into.
